sentences.en: A big archway leads through into a courtyard.
sentences.cn: 一条大拱道直通向一座庭院.

sentences.en: A gust of wind swept the bed off the roof and sent it crashing into the courtyard below.
sentences.cn: 一阵狂风把床吹离了屋顶,“轰”的一声落到下面的院子里.

sentences.en: A hubbub was heard in the courtyard.
After sweeping the courtyard , we might as well clean the rooms.
sentences.cn: 我们扫完院子, 顺手把房间也扫一扫.

sentences.en: Cottrell strode out across the cobbled courtyard.
sentences.cn: 科特雷尔穿过铺着鹅卵石的院子大步走出来。

sentences.en: Rise at dawn and sweep the courtyard.
Striped awnings had been stretched across the courtyard.
sentences.cn: 一些条纹雨篷撑开架在院子上方.

sentences.en: Sunlight was streaming into the courtyard.
Tell children to go and play in the courtyard.
sentences.cn: 叫孩子们到院子里耍去.
月亮照得院子里挺明快.

sentences.en: There are some jujube trees in that courtyard.
sentences.cn: 那个院子里有几棵枣树.

sentences.en: There are some jujube trees in the courtyard.
They walked through the arch and into the cobbled courtyard.
sentences.cn: 他们穿过拱门走进铺着鹅卵石的院子。

sentences.en: This passage leads into the courtyard.
We went through a stone archway into the courtyard.
sentences.cn: 我们穿过石拱门进入院子。

trans.tran_en: an open space that is completely or partly surrounded by buildings
